title: README: add richer examples section
description: Add a larger examples section (close to social-post copy) covering add/test/ask/continue/sessions/json/stdin/attach/timeouts.

title: Decide and add OSS license
description: Choose a license (MIT/Apache-2.0/etc.) and add LICENSE file; update pyproject metadata accordingly.

title: Make `mq query` the primary command
description: Add `mq query` command with `mq ask` kept as an alias; add `mq q` and `mq c` short aliases; update help text, README, and tests to use `query` in examples while preserving backwards compatibility.

title: Support '-' to read query from stdin
description: For ask/continue/test, if the query argument is exactly '-', read the full prompt from stdin (common Unix convention).

title: Maintain last_conversation.json as pointer to latest session
description: Keep ~/.mq/last_conversation.json updated as a symlink (or fallback pointer) to the latest session file so tools can read latest context without scanning sessions dir.

title: mq MVP CLI (ask/continue/dump + model registry)
description: Build an initial mq CLI using llm_client with local dotfile config, model shortnames, last-conversation storage, and commands: add/models/ask/continue(cont)/dump.

title: llm_client integration + error handling
description: Wire mq ask/continue to llm_client.get_provider + retry_request, surface standardized errors, and set exit codes.

title: Config + conversation storage (MQ_HOME, JSON schemas)
description: Implement ~/.mq (or MQ_HOME) creation plus read/write helpers for config.json and last_conversation.json.

title: CLI commands add/models/ask/continue(cont)/dump
description: Implement argparse-based CLI with required subcommands, aliases, and correct overwrite/continue semantics.

title: User docs: README usage
description: Add basic README with installation and usage examples for add/ask/continue/dump.

title: Test suite for mq MVP
description: Add pytest tests covering config/model registry, conversation overwrite vs continue, and CLI parsing. Use MQ_HOME temp dirs.

title: Add -t/-r short flags for timeout/retries
description: Add -t alias for --timeout-seconds and -r alias for --retries on ask/continue/test.

title: Extend --json output with prompt/sysprompt
description: When --json is used, include `prompt` (the query passed to ask/continue/test) and include `sysprompt` when non-empty.

title: Show reasoning traces when provided by models
description: Some models/providers return separate reasoning traces; have mq display them (e.g., to stderr) in ask/continue/test output when present.

title: Support --sysprompt-file for mq add/test
description: Allow loading sysprompt from a file when creating/testing model aliases: --sysprompt-file PATH (and disallow using both --sysprompt and --sysprompt-file).

title: Release readiness checklist
description: Prep mq for sharing: CI, packaging metadata, docs (README + mq help), changelog/release notes, and license selection.

title: Add --attach to append file content to prompt
description: Add --attach PATH (repeatable) for ask/continue/test to append file content into the prompt; support - for stdin with sensible constraints.

title: Add CHANGELOG and release notes
description: Add CHANGELOG.md and a short RELEASE.md describing versioning/tagging.

title: Increase default LLM timeout to 10 minutes
description: mq should use a 10-minute default timeout for LLM requests instead of 60s.

title: Drop ~/.mq/sessions/latest; use ~/.mq/last_conversation.json only
description: Stop maintaining ~/.mq/sessions/latest; rely on top-level ~/.mq/last_conversation.json as the sole latest-session pointer (symlink or pointer file), with fallback scan only if missing.

title: Add configurable timeout/retries for LLM requests
description: Add CLI flags to pass timeout and retry parameters into llm_client.retry_request. Defaults: timeout=600s (existing), max_retries=3. Likely flags: --timeout-seconds, --retries. Apply to ask/continue/test.

title: Session id output + naming/renaming support
description: Reduce session confusion by printing session id in ask/continue output, support named session creation, and add session rename with pointer updates.

title: Add ephemeral ask mode (no session)
description: Add a short flag to `mq ask` to run a one-off query without creating/updating a session file or last_conversation pointer.

title: Improve `mq session list` formatting (2-line + head/tail prompt)
description: Change session list output to two lines per session: line1=id+timestamp, line2=longer first prompt; if prompt is long, show head and tail with ellipsis.

title: Avoid directory scans for latest session lookup
description: Ensure mq can resolve latest session without scanning ~/.mq/sessions (use last_conversation.json pointer as primary). Keep scan only as last-resort fallback.

title: mq config management improvements (test/rm)
description: Add mq test (add+validate with a test query), mq rm to remove shortnames, and ensure add overwrites existing entries. Include tests/docs.

title: Tests/docs for test/rm + overwrite
description: Add/extend unit tests for overwrite, rm, and test command behavior; update PROJECT.md and README.md usage.

title: Add mq test command
description:
Implement `mq test --provider

[--sysprompt ...] ` to validate provider/model via llm_client and (on success) save/overwrite config entry.

title: Add mq rm command
description: Implement `mq rm <shortname>` to remove a configured model shortname.

title: Add `mq help` subcommand with detailed usage
description: Implement `mq help` that prints detailed usage similar to README; support `mq help <command>` to show argparse help for a specific subcommand.

title: Add --json output for model responses
description: Add --json to ask/continue/test to print single-line JSON: {"response":..., "reasoning":...} (omit reasoning if absent). In normal mode, when reasoning exists print reasoning then a blank line + "response:" header before the response.

title: Improve error reporting for chutes provider failures
description: mq test with --provider chutes returns unhelpful empty-content errors; improve error formatting (type/status/raw snippet) and add env var alias if needed; investigate likely root causes.

title: Improve README with install/keys/usage
description: Document install methods, config locations, required env vars per provider, and how to use mq help.

title: README: add Overview + supported providers
description: Add a short high-level Overview (features/examples) and a Supported providers list to README, pointing readers to mq help for details.

title: Add GitHub Actions CI (unittest)
description: Add CI workflow to run unit tests on pushes/PRs.

title: Expand mq help to be thorough/discoverable
description: Make `mq help` comprehensive and ensure subcommand help is discoverable from CLI (including nested topics like `mq help session list`).

title: Persistent sessions (store all, latest symlink, list/select)
description: Change mq to store every conversation as a separate session file under ~/.mq/sessions with random IDs; keep ~/.mq/sessions/latest as a symlink to the last-used session; add `mq session list/select` and `mq continue --session <id>`.

title: Tests/docs for sessions
description: Update unit tests and docs for new session behavior.

title: CLI session commands + continue --session
description: Add `mq session list/select` and `mq continue --session <id>`; update ask/dump to use sessions.

title: Session storage layer
description: Add sessions directory, session create/load/save/list, and latest symlink management.

title: Investigate uv run panic in sandboxed env
description: uv run currently panics with system-configuration NULL object on this host; determine workaround (env vars) or document.

title: Flip mq test default to no-save; add --save flag
description: Change mq test to only validate by default and not write config; add --save to persist/overwrite the alias on success.
